metadata.title: CVE-2024-31143 xen
metadata.description: An optional feature of PCI MSI called "Multiple Message" allows a device to use multiple consecutive interrupt vectors.  Unlike for MSI-X, the setting up of these consecutive vectors needs to happen all in one go.  In this handling an error path could be taken in different situations, with or without a particular lock held.  This error path wrongly releases the lock even when it is not currently held.
